author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing JIRA Issue #1446: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1446. When the value passed in is a StringBuffer we normalize the value in place. This is problematic for unions because it corrupts the initial value seen by the subsequent type validators. If there is more than one member type convert the initial value to a string before passing it on to the member type validators.

author: mrglavas
